thread.title: BRIEF-Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Announces Launch Of Secondary Public Offering By Selling Shareholders

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Announces Launch Of Secondary Public Offering By Selling Shareholders
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd :
* NORWEGIAN CRUISE LINE HOLDINGS LTD. ANNOUNCES LAUNCH OF SECONDARY PUBLIC OFFERING BY SELLING SHAREHOLDERS
* NORWEGIAN CRUISE- SECONDARY OFFERING OF 19.5 MILLION OF CO‘S ORDINARY SHARES BY CERTAIN FUNDS AFFILIATED WITH APOLLO GLOBAL MANAGEMENT, LLC, STAR NCLC HOLDINGS LTD​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
